page.title: 20LOCAL NEWSPAPERS IN LOWDHAM.
page.content: There are a number of different newspapers which people in Lowdham read. Here are the three popular ones: 1) The Nottingham Evening Post _____________________________ This paper covers all of Nottingham and the surrounding area, including Lowdham.It is printed daily and costs seventeen pence. 2) The Newark Advertiser _______________________ This paper covers Newark and the local areas. It is printed every Friday and costs eighteen pence. 3) The Midweek Advertiser ________________________ This is a free paper which is distributed in the Newark and South Notts. areas every week. ______________________________________ {Compiled by the children of {Lowdham C.of E. Primary School.
